channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Weighing The Pros And Cons Of Low-Friction SaaS Adoption
item.description: By opting for a more gradual adoption of SaaS products at your organization, stakeholders may experience notable productivity and workflow benefits.

item.title: Where Will The Games Industry Find Its Next $100B?
item.description: The opportunity is there. And the talent, conveniently, is available.

item.title: Godfather Is A Risk To Android Users Worldwide As 500 Apps Targeted
item.description: Hackers want to make you an offer you can’t refuse. Android Godfather malware is spreading globally to target more than 500 bank and crypto apps.
